South Africa crushed Netherlands by 150 runs in an exhilarating T20i match.
Quinton de Kock scored a rapid century, amassing 104 runs off just 55 balls.
Anrich Nortje delivered a brilliant bowling spell, taking 4 wickets for 20 runs.
The match was held in Amsterdam, with an impressive turnout of fans.
Netherlands struggled in their chase, failing to build significant partnerships.
While Netherlands showed some resistance, South Africa's dominance was evident.
Despite the loss, Netherlands players gained valuable experience against top-tier opposition.
